Quickstrike:





Quickstrike slumped his shoulders and sighed. Tarantulas looked 
uninterested in aiding in this new assignment. He wasn't much on 
making ships self destruct, but a bot could learn. He just needed at 
least some assistance. 

He looked around the room. "Say, Paralysis, wanna come wit'? Might 
need some help wit' this."

He then took a step forward, towards Black Arachnia. "Ya know, we 
might be able t' use that rat fer some of this. Make 'im work fer us--
use 'im fer bait, 'til it's over, then we's can kill 'im." He 
chuckled.
